description.value: When a dragonblood ooze is slain, its amorphous form collapses into a puddle. The puddle looks like blood, but is thicker, almost gelatinous. Dragon blood normally has many beneficial uses, but the tainted slime of a dragonblood ooze is a vile, acidic substance. Alchemists, spellcasters and anyone that performs odd experiments may be interested in the substance.
